p: Also, the 2017 outbreak was caused by the East Central South African (ECSA) genotype IOL strains, but both human and mosquito strains isolated in 2017 did not carry the E1â€“A226V mutation [ 7, 38]. Moreover, E1 gene sequences from the patients and from the mosquitoes were identical and very similar to the CHIKV strain involved in a recent epidemic in Pakistan [ 8, 39] and most likely introduced into Italy in May 2017.
